name: Clearleft
description:
Clearleft is an award winning Strategic Design & Innovation Consultancy based in Brighton, UK.
Our team of industry–leading strategists, design thinkers, technologists and innovators work inside global brands to help design leaders get the most from their products, services & teams.

12 years ago we established ourselves as one of the very first UX agencies in Europe. Since then, we’ve built a worldwide reputation for helping to bring the practice of user experience design to the mainstream, through our many books, articles, talks and events, including the ever popular UX London conference.
Human–centered design is, and always has been, central to the Clearleft philosophy.
